src:
Partizanu derbi kola, prvi poraz „pantera“
02 Nov 2019, 21:59 by Darko
Partizan – FMP 90:85 (19:20, 21:20, 26:19, 24:26)
Košarkaši Partizana su u derbiju 5. kola ABA lige bili bolji od FMP-a. Crno-beli su morali svojski da se potrude da bi naneli prvi poraz „panterima“ ove sezone.
Ekipa iz Železnika je u izjednačenoj igri bila u malom vođstvu do završnice treće četvrtine, kada je Partizan konačno zaigrao sa mnogo više energije i preuzeo kontrolu.
Zagorac je sa četiri brza poena doneo početno vođstvo Partizanu, ali su odmah odgovorili „panteri“. Uzastopnim trojkama Radanova, Rita i Ulubaja preuzeli su vođstvo i stavili crno-belima do znanja da ih čeka težak posao.
FMP je poveo sa 11:4, ali nije dugo uspeo da zadrži sedam poena prednosti. Ipak, ni Partizan nije uspeo da napravi značajniji rezultatski beg, pa se do kraja prvog poluvremena igralo koš za koš, a na odmor otišlo pri nerešenom rezultatu 40:40.
Partizan je uglavnom poentirao iz reketa, izuzev dve trojke Pejnersa, ujedno i jedina Partizanova dva pogotka iz 11 pokušaja iza linije 6.75 metara u prvom poluvremenu. Na drugoj strani, FMP je pogodio šest trojki iz deset pokušaja i pored toga bio spreman da brzim napadima kazni svako malo sporije vraćanje u odbranu izabranika Andree Trinkijerija.



U istom ritmu je počela i treća četvrtina. Posle trojki Jeremića i Pota FMP je stekao pet poena prednosti, dok je Partizan i dalje bio bezopasan u šutu sa distance. „Panteri“ su čuvali vođstvo do 26. minuta, kada je Ulubaj pogodio svoju drugu trojku večeras, ali i drugu od početka sezone u ABA ligi. Od tog trenutka crno-beli su odigrali sa mnogo više energije u odbrani i to naplatili i u napadu. Serijom od 14:2, koju je zaključilo zakucavanje Jaramaza, Partizan je na kraju treće deonice stigao do sedam poena prednosti (66:59).
Dobro su počeli crno-beli i poslednju četvrtinu, poveli su sa 71:63, ali „panterima“ nije padalo na pamet da se predaju. Serijom od 8:2 FMP je istopio prednost domaćeg tima, ali je taj napad odbio Gordić sa pet uzastopnih poena.
Aleksa Radanov je na drugoj strani pogodio trojku, a zatim koš uz faul i minut i 48 sekundi pre kraja Partizan je imao samo plus 2 (84:82).
Posle poena Jaramaza sa linije slobodnih bacanja, Vil Mozli je odigrao ključnu ulogu za pobedu Partizana. Blokirao je Pota, a zatim uhvatio skok u napadu, posle čega je Rašon Tomas poentirao za 88:82, 39 sekundi pre kraja i FMP je morao da prizna poraz.
Tomas je sa 23 poena bio i najefikasniji kod crno-belih, Gordić je postigao 15, a Jaramaz 10 poena. U ekipi iz Železnika Radanov se zaustavio na 18 poena, Rit je postigao 14, a Stefan Pot je uz sedam poena imao i 12 asistencija.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Partizan derby car, first defeat of the Panthers
02 Nov 2019, 20:59 by Darko
Partizan - FMP 90:85 (19:20, 21:20, 26:19, 24:26)
Partizan basketball players were better than FMP in the 5th round of the ABA League. Black and whites had to work hard to defeat the Panthers this season.
The team from Železnik were in the even game in a small lead until the end of the third quarter, when Partizan finally played with much more energy and took control.
Zagorac, with four quick points, gave the Partizan the lead, but the Panthers responded immediately. The successive triads of Radanov, Rita and Ulubai took the lead and let the black and whites know that hard work awaited them.
FMP took the lead with 11: 4, but it didn't last long to retain the seven point lead. However, even Partizan failed to make a significant score run, so by the end of the first half a basket was played and the rest went to a draw 40:40.
Partizan scored mostly from the rackets, with the exception of two of Peyner's triples, and also Partizan's only two hits from 11 attempts behind the 6.75-meter line in the first half. FMP, on the other hand, hit six threes out of ten attempts and was more than ready to punish any slower rebound in the defense of Andrea Trinkieri.



The third quarter started at the same pace. After triples of Jeremic and Pot FMP gained five points of advantage, while Partizan remained harmless in the shot from distance. The Panthers kept the lead until the 26th minute, when Ulubaj hit his second triple tonight, as well as his second since the start of the season in the ABA League. From that moment on, the black and whites played with much more energy in defense and also charged in the attack. With the 14-2 series concluded by the yoke of Jaramaz, Partizan reached the seven-point lead at the end of the third leg (66:59).
Black and whites started well and the last quarter, they led with 71:63, but the Panthers did not mind giving up. An 8-2 draw by FMP melted away the home team advantage, but Gordic deflected that attack with five consecutive points.
Aleksa Radanov, on the other hand, hit a threesome, then the basket with a foul and a minute and 48 seconds before the end Partizan had only plus 2 (84:82).
After Jaramaz scored from the free throw line, Will Mozley played a key role in winning Partizan. He blocked Pot and then caught a rebound in the attack, after which Rashon Thomas scored 88-82, 39 seconds before the end and FMP had to concede defeat.
With 23 points, Thomas was the most efficient in black and white, Gordic scored 15 and Jaramaz 10 points. In the team from Zeleznik Radanov stopped at 18 points, Rit scored 14, and Stefan Pot also had 12 assists with seven points.
